titles.title: Jared Morgan Fairness Act

To amend the Public Health Service Act with respect to the compensation rules under the National Vaccine Injury Compensation Program for vaccines administered before the effective date of such program.

action.text: Referred to the House Committee on Commerce.
Referred to the Subcommittee on Health and Environment.

bill.summary: 9/13/2000--Introduced. Jared Morgan Fairness Act - Amends the Public Health Service Act to repeal a provision concerning separate compensation rules for a vaccine-related injury or death associated with the administration of a vaccine before the effective date of the national vaccine injury compensation program.
